text:
Aubrey David Nicholas Jasper de Grey (born 20 April 1963) is an English author. He is the Chief Science Officer of the SENS Research Foundation and VP of New Technology Discovery at AgeX Therapeutics, Inc.
Early life.
De Grey was born and brought up in London, England.
Aging.
De Grey thinks that it will be possible to stop aging. He thinks that the first human who will live more than 1,000 years was born.
Cryonics.
De Grey is a cryonicist. He signed up with Alcor.
